title: Brazil Senators Approve Pension System Overhaul
text:
BRASÍLIA—Brazilian senators overwhelmingly approved on Tuesday a revamp of the country’s insolvent social-security system, which will sharply lower spending and serve as a pillar for President Jair Bolsonaro’s overhaul of a sluggish economy hamstrung by bureaucracy and protectionism.

The legislation, which is projected to save taxpayers as much as $200 billion over 10 years, is a political victory for the president, who has been distracted by clashes with foreign leaders and lawmakers in the capital, even from his own party....
description: Brazilian senators overwhelmingly approved on Tuesday a sweeping revamp of the country’s insolvent social-security system in a political victory for President Jair Bolsonaro.
